mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.sys_org_code AS "sysOrgCode", a.tenant_id AS "tenantId", a.app_id AS "appId", a.plan_id AS "planId", a.subscribe_type AS "subscribeType", a.effective_on AS "effectiveOn", a.expire_on AS "expireOn", a.payment_amount AS "paymentAmount", a.payment_time AS "paymentTime", a.trade_no AS "tradeNo", a.trade_state AS "tradeState", a.transaction_code AS "transactionCode", a.invoice_id AS "invoiceId"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subscription( id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, sys_org_code, tenant_id, app_id, plan_id, subscribe_type, effective_on, expire_on, payment_amount, payment_time, trade_no, trade_state, transaction_code, invoice_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateTime}, #{sysOrgCode}, #{tenantId}, #{appId}, #{planId}, #{subscribeType}, #{effectiveOn}, #{expireOn}, #{paymentAmount}, #{paymentTime}, #{tradeNo}, #{tradeState}, #{transactionCode}, #{invoiceId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE subscription SET create_time = #{createTime}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateTime}, sys_org_code = #{sysOrgCode}, tenant_id = #{tenantId}, app_id = #{appId}, plan_id = #{planId}, subscribe_type = #{subscribeType}, effective_on = #{effectiveOn}, expire_on = #{expireOn}, payment_amount = #{paymentAmount}, payment_time = #{paymentTime}, trade_no = #{tradeNo}, trade_state = #{tradeState}, transaction_code = #{transactionCode}, invoice_id = #{invoiceId} WHERE id = #{id}
